name: Fabric adhesive tape, black, Width×Length (mm×m): 48X50
description: The tesa® 4662 duct tape has excellent adhesion even on rough and dusty substrates. It is waterproof, conformable and flexible. Ideal for sealing pipes and conduits as well as for applications on plaster and masonry. It is easy to tear by hand in both longitudinal and transverse directions. The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Fabric adhesive tape, grey, Type: 48X50
description: The tesa® 74662 duct tape has excellent adhesion even on rough and dusty substrates. It is waterproof, conformable and flexible. Ideal for sealing pipes and lines as well as for applications on plaster and masonry. It is easy to tear by hand in longitudinal and transverse directions. The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines. New dimensions: Fabric tapes tesa 74662 are 2 mm wider (50×50)!

name: Fabric adhesive tape, silver, Width×Length (mm×m): 48X50
description: The tesa® 4662 duct tape has excellent tack even on rough and dusty substrates. It is waterproof, conformable and flexible. Ideal for sealing pipes and conduits as well as for applications on plaster and masonry. It is easy to tear by hand in both length and width. The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Fabric adhesive tape set 3-piece, pink, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X25
description: tesa® 4671 is a fluorescent, non-reflective fabric adhesive tape with a cellulose fiber carrier. It tears easily by hand, is residue-free removable, bonds on rough surfaces, and can be written on. Commonly used for marking, fixing, fastening or bundling in events and other applications. The tape features an acrylic-coated fabric combined with a natural rubber adhesive for high abrasion resistance. Available in neon green, neon yellow, neon orange and neon pink. Minimum shelf life depends on proper storage conditions.

name: Recycled fabric duct tape, black, Size: 50×50 (mm×m)
description: The tesa® 4615 is a universal, more sustainable duct tape made from recycled material and a solvent-free synthetic rubber adhesive. Features: 63% of the carrier material is recycled plastic (PCR); high immediate tack on various materials; smooth unwinding and hand-tearable; water-repellent and durable.

name: tesa® 56497 Ultra Power Clear fabric adhesive tape, UV-resistant, transparent, 48 mm × 20 m
description: tesa® 56497 Ultra Power Clear is designed for indoor and outdoor applications. With high UV and temperature resistance it can be used in extreme weather and temperatures from -10°C to +90°C. The transparent repair tape is ideal for outdoor activities and household (temporary) repairs. Minimum shelf life depends on compliance with storage guidelines.

name: Cloth adhesive tape UV-resistant, blue-gray, Width×Length (mm×m): 48X23
description: The 3M™ 8979 is suitable for permanent and temporary indoor and outdoor applications due to its conformable structure and UV resistance. It is also water-repellent and can therefore be used for sealing. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Recycled Fabric Heavy Duct Tape, black, 50 mm x 50 m
description: The tesa® 60462 is a robust, more sustainable duct tape made from recycled material with a solvent-free synthetic rubber adhesive. Features: 67% of the carrier material consists of recycled plastics (PCR); instant adhesion to many materials including rough surfaces; soft unrolling and hand-tearable; water-repellent and durable. Also suitable for rough surfaces.

name: Fabric adhesive tape set, 3-piece, orange, 50 mm × 25 m
description: The tesa® 4671 is a fabric carrier tape made from cellulose fabric, non-reflective and fluorescent. The combination of an acrylic-coated fabric carrier and a natural rubber adhesive provides high abrasion resistance. Available in neon colors (neon green, neon yellow, neon orange, neon pink). Minimum shelf life depends on correct storage.

name: Recycled Fabric Heavy Duct Tape, grey, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X50

name: Recycled packaging tape, brown, 50 mm x 50 m
description: Universally applicable and recycling-friendly packaging tape. tesa 4713 is a universally applicable packaging tape based on a fine crepe paper carrier and a natural rubber adhesive. The carrier is made from paper from responsibly managed, FSC®-certified forests and other controlled sources. Solvent-free production process. Suitable for lightweight cartons up to max. 10 kg. Good adhesion on different carton qualities. Recycling-friendly tape, tested according to the INGEDE method.

name: Precision crepe tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 19X50
description: The tesa Precision crepe® 4334 consists of an extremely thin and tear-resistant paper backing coated with an acrylate adhesive. The product is suitable for many painting applications up to 6 months indoors and up to 8 weeks outdoors that require a flat, precise and sharp paint and lacquer edge. It can be used on various sensitive surfaces such as glass, aluminium, HPVC and wood. The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: PVC adhesive tape, Color: BLUE
description: The 3M™ 764i can be used for non-critical applications such as color marking and bundling. It is corrosion-resistant, flexible, abrasion-resistant, conformable, easy to apply and moisture-resistant. 3M™ color and floor marking tapes are ideal for building maintenance and improving safety in facilities. The special structure of the colored PVC adhesive tapes resists scratches, abrasion, weathering and most chemicals. Easy to work with, very conformable even on uneven surfaces. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to adherence to specified storage guidelines.

name: Insulating tape, 19 mm × 25 m, Color: BLACK
categoryEnglishName: Electrician’s adhesive tapes & insulating adhesive tapes
subCategoryEnglishNames: Electrician’s adhesive tapes & insulating adhesive tapes
description: The 3M™ Temflex® 165 is a universally usable, soft PVC insulating tape. Flame retardant. Self-extinguishing, good resistance to oil and solvents. For insulating, bundling, fastening and color marking. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: PVC warning marking tape, color: YB
description: The adhesive tape is suitable for marking hazard spots and material storage locations and for marking corners and edges. Ideal for areas with low load from industrial trucks. The 3M™ color and floor marking tapes are well suited for building maintenance and improving safety in facilities. The special structure of the colored PVC adhesive tapes resists scratches, abrasion, weathering and most chemicals. Easy to process, very conformable even on uneven surfaces. The 3M™ 766i is yellow-black striped. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Aluminium adhesive tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 25X55
description: The soft aluminium adhesive tape is suitable for galvanizing, has strong heat and light reflection, and is weather and chemical resistant. The 3M™ 431 provides excellent sealing properties by offering good moisture shielding and is suitable for long-term applications. The stated shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Soft PVC adhesive tape, Color: CLEAR
description: The 3M™ 471F can be used for marking hazard zones and aisles, masking during painting, color coding or decorative trims. It adheres to many surfaces, applies quickly and drip-free without drying or cleaning, and removes without adhesive residue. The colored PVC tapes are suitable for building maintenance and improving safety; their structure resists scratches, abrasion, weathering and most chemicals. Flexible, conforms to uneven surfaces. Minimum shelf life depends on storage conditions.

name: Packaging tape, brown, 50 mm × 50 m
description: tesa® 4713 is a packaging tape for sealing packages based on a fine crepe paper carrier. The paper, obtained from responsibly managed FSC®-certified forests and other controlled sources, together with the natural rubber adhesive provides good adhesion on various surfaces and good initial tack. Powerful and eco-friendly packing tape for light cartons up to 10 kg. Carrier made of FSC-certified paper. Can be disposed of together with the carton. Suitable for manual and automatic application.

name: Double-sided removable adhesive tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X25
description: The 3M™ 9195 is a double-sided acrylic adhesive tape (carpet tape) with adhesive sides of different tack levels (high tack / removable). After use, bonded carpets can be removed from hard floors/substrates without residue. The stated shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Double-sided adhesive tape, 50 mm × 25 m
description: The 3M™ 9191 is a double-sided adhesive tape characterized by a pressure-sensitive synthetic rubber adhesive with high tack and immediate adhesion. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: 3M 969 Adhesive Film, Width×Length (mm×m): 19X33
description: The 3M™ 969 is a double-sided transparent adhesive film (carrierless). Very high initial tack and good adhesion to low-energy substrates. For slightly rough or textured surfaces. Universally usable on many substrates for mounting trims, signs, etc. Compatible hand dispenser: No. 083631 ATG700. The stated shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the prescribed storage guidelines.

name: Paper masking tape set, Width×Length (mm×m): 19X50
description: The tesakrepp® 4329 is a lightly creped paper masking tape. The product is thin and flexible, has good wet-sanding resistance and good paint and filler adhesion on the tape backing. It is also suitable for general masking tasks at temperatures up to 70°C. The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Aluminium adhesive tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 25X55
description: The soft aluminium adhesive tape is suitable for galvanizing, has strong heat and light reflection and is weather- and chemical-resistant. The 3M™ 425 can largely be removed residue-free and conforms to curved and uneven surfaces. The stated shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Floor marking tape extra strong, color: BLUE
description: The 3M™ 971 is a very durable adhesive tape specially developed for use in areas exposed to the toughest demands. It remains highly visible even on surfaces with constant forklift traffic and frequent pallet handling. When process flows change frequently, it can be replaced quickly and cleanly. The 3M™ color and floor marking tapes are ideal for building maintenance and improving safety in facilities. The special structure of the colored PVC adhesive tapes resists scratches, abrasion, weathering and most chemicals. Easy to process, very conformable even on uneven surfaces. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Reinforced fabric adhesive tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 38X25
description: The tesa® 53799 provides very good adhesion on rough surfaces. It is easy to tear by hand, water-repellent, weather-resistant, strong and very conformable. Ideal for various repair and construction tasks, as well as packing, bundling, bonding, etc. Note: The specified minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to adherence to the prescribed storage guidelines.

name: Fabric adhesive tape set, 4-piece, yellow, 38×25 (mm×m)
description: The tesa® 4671 has a cellulose fabric carrier, is non-reflective, fluorescent and suitable for nearly any type of application. It tears easily by hand, can be removed without residue, adheres to rough surfaces and can be written on. The fluorescent neon colors are ideal for marking elements or for event use. The combination of acrylic-coated fabric and a natural rubber adhesive provides high abrasion resistance. The tape can be removed without residue and is available in neon green, neon yellow, neon orange and neon pink. The stated shelf life of tesa® products assumes compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Fabric adhesive tape, light green, 50 mm x 50 m
description: The tesa® 4621 is a general-purpose fabric adhesive tape suitable for outdoor use. It can be torn by hand in both lengthwise and crosswise directions. It provides smooth unwinding without the tape rolling in on itself, is waterproof and UV-resistant, and can be removed residue-free for up to 8 weeks. The fabric tape tesa® 4671 in neon colours lets you handle various tasks reliably—especially for marking different elements or in event areas. The tesa® 4671 fabric tape is available in fluorescent neon colours and is frequently used by professionals for visible marking of movable elements or at events. It is suitable for many applications such as marking, fixing, fastening, or bundling. tesa® 4671 can be torn by hand, is easy to write on, non-reflective and formable. The combination of acrylic-coated fabric and a natural rubber adhesive provides high abrasion resistance. The fabric tape can be removed without leaving residue and is available in neon green, neon yellow, neon orange and neon pink. The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage instructions.

name: Fabric adhesive tape set, 4-piece, green, Width×Length (mm×m): 38X25
description: tesa 4671 is a fabric-backed (cellulose) fluorescent, non-reflective adhesive tape available in neon colors. It is easy to tear by hand, removable without residue, adheres to rough surfaces and can be written on. Commonly used for marking and event applications. The tape combines an acrylate-coated fabric backing with a natural rubber adhesive for high abrasion resistance. Available colors include neon green, neon yellow, neon orange and neon pink. name: Thread sealing cord -55°C to 150°C, DVGW/KTW, PN max. 5 bar/16 bar
description: Thread sealing cord, temperature: -55°C to 150°C, DVGW + KTW approval according to DIN EN 751-1, PN max. 5 bar (gas), 16 bar (drinking water). Universally usable, non-curing thread sealant in the form of an impregnated nylon cord. Suitable for all metal and plastic thread combinations; for drinking and wastewater, gas, compressed air and industrial oils; for aqueous and non-aqueous fluids. Clean processing, adjustable, non-curing, odorless, good chemical resistance. DVGW approval according to DIN 751-1 and DIN 30660, test mark DV-5142 AU 0166. KTW approval for hot water up to 95 °C and pressures up to 16 bar.

name: Cloth adhesive tape, olive green, 50 mm × 50 m
description: Cloth tape with hotmelt adhesive for simple masking and repair tasks. PE-laminated, water-repellent. Suitable for many covering and masking tasks. Designed for high tear resistance. Easy to unwind, tear off and abrasion-resistant. Service life indoors and outdoors up to 2 weeks. Versatile for repair work and applications such as repairing, protecting, masking and packaging. Good adhesion on rough substrates. UV-resistant, high tensile strength and abrasion-resistant. Check substrate suitability before bonding.

name: Polyethylene slip tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 19X16
description: The 3M™ 5423 protects surfaces through excellent abrasion resistance and creates a sliding surface that allows contact without wear. No additional lubricants are required. It is chemical-resistant, transparent and can be processed into die-cut parts using a release liner. The specified shelf life refers to compliance with storage guidelines.

name: PVC adhesive tape, white, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X33
description: Universally applicable adhesive tapes for numerous areas of application such as repairing, protecting, masking and packaging. For protecting smooth substrates such as wood, aluminium or glass. Smooth PVC protective tape made of a conformable soft PVC film. Service life indoors and outdoors up to 3 weeks. Check substrate suitability before bonding.

name: Packaging tape set, 6-piece, color: beige
description: Universal packaging tape is usable on all common hand dispensers and unwinds quietly. The tesapack® 4120 is a universal PVC packaging tape with a strong natural rubber adhesive. Even and quiet unwind. Very suitable for processing with all common hand dispensers. The stated minimum shelf life of tesa® products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Cloth adhesive tape, black, Width×Length (mm×m): 48X50
description: Cloth tape with hotmelt adhesive for simple masking and repair jobs. PE laminated for water resistance. Suitable for many masking and taping tasks, designed for high tear strength. Easy to unwind, hand-tearable and abrasion resistant. Service life indoors and outdoors up to 2 weeks. Versatile for repairs, protecting, masking and packaging. Before bonding, check substrate suitability.

name: Recycled packaging tape, transparent, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X66
description: Universally usable and recycling-friendly packaging tape. tesa 60412 is a universal packing tape made from a PET carrier with 90% recycled (PCR) PET and a water-based acrylic adhesive system. Features: solvent-free production, quiet unwinding, suitable for sealing boxes up to 30 kg, good adhesion on various carton qualities, recycling-friendly tape tested according to the INGEDE method.

name: Fine crepe adhesive tape set natural, Width×Length (mm×m): 18X50
description: Universally usable adhesive tapes for numerous application areas such as repairing, protecting, masking and packaging. Lightly creped tape with good adhesive strength for short-term masking on smooth substrates indoors. Temperature resistant up to 60°C. Check substrate suitability before bonding.

name: 3M Double-sided VHB™ Tape, for permanent and strong bonding, grey
description: Double-sided high-performance tape made of pure acrylate adhesive (VHB) for permanently strong bonds. High initial tack, resistant to temperature, weathering, UV and solvents. Excellent sealing function and vibration damping. Suitable for indoor and outdoor mounting; bonds aluminium, stainless steel, zinc-plated steel, polycarbonate or ABS.
_check: backing inferred as acrylic foam (VHB); temperature and weight missing from page

name: Double-sided adhesive tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 19X50
description: The tesafix® 4965 is a double-sided, durable, clear polyester adhesive tape with acrylic adhesive for indoor and outdoor use. Ideal for bonding on glass, metal, smooth tiles, treated wood and many plastics such as ABS and even EPDM, as it is very resistant to plasticizers. It withstands temperatures up to 100 °C and is resistant to moisture, certain chemicals, plasticizers and UV radiation.

name: Packaging tape set, 6-piece, Color: CLEAR
description: Universal packaging tape usable on all common hand dispensers; quiet unwind. The tesa pack 4024 is a nearly invisible PP tape. UV-, ageing- and temperature-resistant for an attractive appearance and longer storage life. Minimum shelf life refers to compliance with storage guidelines. Features: quiet unwind; high UV/ageing/temperature resistance; well suited for processing with common hand dispensers.

name: Electrical insulating tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 19X6
categoryEnglishName: Electrician's adhesive tapes & insulating adhesive tapes
subCategoryEnglishNames: Electrician's adhesive tapes & insulating adhesive tapes
description: The 3M Scotch® Super 88 and Scotch® Super 33+ is a particularly elastic and UV-resistant premium adhesive tape with very good electrical properties and resistance to moisture, alkalis, many acids and solvents. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M products refers to following the specified storage guidelines.

name: Precision adhesive tape set, Width×Length (mm×m): 18X50
description: Universally usable adhesive tapes for many applications such as repairing, protecting, masking and packaging. For sharp paint edges on smooth and slightly rough substrates. UV-resistant. Thin standard masking tape made of specialty paper (washi). Good adhesion and tear resistance. Indoor service life up to 3 months, outdoor up to 4 weeks. Check substrate suitability before bonding.

name: Cloth adhesive tape, silver, Width×Length (mm×m): 48X50
description: Cloth tape with hotmelt adhesive for simple masking and repair jobs. PE laminated so also water-repellent. Suitable for a wide range of masking and covering tasks. Designed for applications with high tear resistance requirements. Easy to unwind, tear off by hand and abrasion resistant. Usable indoors and outdoors for up to 2 weeks. Universal adhesive tape for many applications such as repairing, protecting, masking and packaging. Check surface suitability before bonding.

name: Electrical insulating tape, width×length (mm×m): 19X20
categoryEnglishName: Electrician's adhesive tapes & insulating adhesive tapes
subCategoryEnglishNames: Electrician's adhesive tapes & insulating adhesive tapes
description: The 3M Scotch® Super 88 and Scotch® Super 33+ is a particularly elastic and UV-resistant premium adhesive tape with very good electrical properties and resistance to moisture, alkalis, many acids and solvents. The specified minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: VHB™ Adhesive Tape, white, Width×Length (mm×m): 12X33
description: Double-sided high-performance adhesive tape made of pure acrylate adhesive (VHB) for permanently strong bonds. High initial tack, high resistance to temperature, weather, UV and solvents. Excellent sealing properties and vibration damping. The 3M™ LSE-110WF is specially designed for challenging bonds to low-energy plastics and composite materials for indoor and outdoor use. Stated shelf life refers to correct storage. Additional 3M™ VHB™ tapes in different thicknesses and lengths available on request.

name: 3M Double-sided VHB™ Adhesive Tape, for permanent and strong bonding, black
description: Double-sided high-performance adhesive tape made of pure acrylic adhesive (VHB) for permanently strong bonds. High initial tack, high resistance to temperature, weather, UV and solvents. Excellent sealing function and vibration damping. The 3M™ 5952 is suitable for indoor and outdoor use. It can be applied quickly and easily and offers powerful, long-lasting durability. Suitable for a variety of surfaces such as powder coatings. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines. Other 3M™ VHB™ tapes in various thicknesses and lengths available on request.

name: PVC adhesive tape, red, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X33
description: Universally usable adhesive tapes for numerous applications such as repairing, protecting, masking and packaging. For protection of smooth substrates like wood, aluminium or glass. Smooth PVC protective tape made of a conformable soft PVC film. Service life indoors and outdoors up to 3 weeks. Before bonding, check the substrate for suitability.

name: PVC adhesive tape, blue, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X33
description: Universally usable adhesive tapes for numerous applications such as repairing, protecting, masking and packing. For protection of smooth substrates (e.g. wood, aluminium or glass). Smooth PVC protective tape made of a conformable soft PVC film. Service life indoors and outdoors up to 3 weeks. Before bonding, check substrate suitability.

name: 3M Double-sided Adhesive Tape VHB™, for high temperature resistance, grey
description: Double-sided high-performance adhesive tape made of pure acrylic adhesive (VHB) for permanently strong bonds. High initial tack, high temperature, weather, UV and solvent resistance. Excellent sealing function, vibration-damping. The 3M™ GPH-110GF consists of an adaptable foam core and withstands high temperatures. It is used for quick and easy creation of a strong, durable and permanent bond. The stated shelf life of 3M™ products refers to adherence to the specified storage guidelines. Further 3M™ VHB™ tapes in various thicknesses and lengths available on request.
material: Acrylic foam with siliconized PE liner

name: Filament adhesive tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 25X50
description: The 3M™ 8954 consists of PP with high-strength fiberglass reinforcement (longitudinal and transverse) offering very high tear and abrasion resistance. Suitable for hazardous goods transport packaging. For bundling and securing, e.g. pallet or product securing. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: tesafix 4952 mirror adhesive tape
description: The tesafix® 4952 is a double-sided PE foam adhesive tape with acrylate adhesive. Provides permanently strong bonds, high initial tack, tensile and shear strength, and good temperature and ageing resistance. Ideal for mirror bonding. For permanent fastening or mounting of components indoors on smooth surfaces. Minimum shelf life depends on correct storage conditions.

name: Cloth adhesive tape, red, Width×Length (mm×m): 38X25
description: Cloth tape with hotmelt adhesive for simple masking and repair work. PE-laminated for water resistance. Suitable for many covering and masking tasks; designed for high tear resistance. Easy to unwind and tear by hand, abrasion-resistant. Service life indoor and outdoor up to 2 weeks. Universally usable for repair work and applications such as repairing, protecting, masking and packaging. UV-resistant, very good tear strength and abrasion resistant. Good adhesion even on rough substrates. Before bonding, check substrate suitability.

name: PVC adhesive tape, orange, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X33
description: Universally applicable adhesive tape for many applications such as repairing, protecting, masking and packing. For protection of smooth substrates (wood, aluminium or glass). Smooth PVC protective tape made from a conformable soft PVC film. Service life indoors and outdoors up to 3 weeks. Check substrate suitability before bonding.

name: Self-fusing insulating tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 19X9
categoryEnglishName: Electrician’s adhesive tapes & insulating adhesive tapes
subCategoryEnglishNames: Electrician’s adhesive tapes & insulating adhesive tapes
description: The 3M Scotch® 23 is an ozone-resistant ethylene-propylene rubber adhesive tape compatible with all cable jacket materials, offering excellent dielectric properties. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines.

name: Double-sided adhesive tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 50X25
description: The double-sided installation tape tesa® 51960 consists of a PP film and an adhesive made from modified acrylic. It is suitable for tradespeople who professionally and securely install carpets with foam or textile backing. The tape provides differentiated adhesion levels, ensuring secure hold on almost all substrates while still being removable without residue. It can be torn by hand and is resistant to moisture and mild chemicals.

name: 3M Double-sided VHB™ Tape, for transparent adhesive bonding, transparent
description: Double-sided high-performance tape made from pure acrylic adhesive (VHB) for permanently strong bonds. High immediate tack, high resistance to temperature, weathering, UV and solvents. Excellent sealing function, vibration-damping. The 3M™ 4910 is highly transparent and therefore suitable for mounting backlit, translucent signs, for resin-reinforced glass, metal and materials with high surface energy (HSE), decorative materials and trims, nameplates and logos, panel bonding and attachment of stiffening elements. The stated shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines. Other 3M™ VHB™ tapes in various thicknesses and lengths available on request.
material: Acrylic adhesive; siliconized PE film liner

name: tesafix® 4934 double-sided adhesive tape, 50 mm × 25 m
description: The tesafix® 4934 is a double-sided adhesive tape. It consists of a fabric carrier equipped with a high adhesive mass coating. The adhesive is solvent-free and has a high initial tack. Due to the flexible, conformable fabric carrier and the high adhesive mass application, it is specially suitable for bonding on rough and fibrous substrates.

name: 3M Double-sided VHB™ Tape, for permanent and strong bonding, black
description: Double-sided high-performance tape made of pure acrylic adhesive (VHB) for permanently strong bonds. High initial tack, high temperature, weather, UV and solvent resistance. Excellent sealing function, vibration-damping. The 3M™ 5962F stands for reliability across the board. It offers optimal conformability to the surfaces to be bonded, enabling both thin and textured surfaces to be fully bonded without stress. The stated minimum shelf life of 3M™ products refers to compliance with the specified storage guidelines. Other 3M™ VHB™ tapes in various thicknesses and lengths are available on request.

name: Double-sided adhesive tape, Width×Length (mm×m): 12X50
description: The 3M™ GPT-020F is a double-sided adhesive tape characterised by high moisture resistance, very high initial tack, very good shear strength even at elevated temperatures and good UV resistance.

name: Carpet double-sided adhesive tape, white, 50 mm x 25 m
description: Universally applicable adhesive tapes for numerous applications such as repairing, protecting, masking and packaging. Usable indoors and outdoors for up to 2 weeks. Fabric tape with hotmelt adhesive for simple masking and repair tasks. PE-laminated and water-repellent. Suitable for many covering and masking tasks, especially where high tear resistance is required. Easy to unwind, tear off and abrasion resistant. Double-sided fabric adhesive tape (carpet tape) for permanent bonding. Good adhesion on rough substrates. Before bonding, check substrate suitability.
